name: Black Label Trading Co. - Lawless - Grand Toro
additionalNotes: Lawless use Nicaraguan binder and filler, and dressed in an oily Ecuadorian Habano Rosado wrapper, one can see that Lawless was cigar created to impress. The medium to full-bodied profile with powerful notes of cocoa, coffee, earth, wood, and pepper breaks all boundaries of flavor and brings an incredibly enjoyable chaos to the palate. In a world where everyday is filled with rules and regulations.
